channel.title: International Programs - E Pakag
channel.description: e-Pak Ag - helping farmers through the use of Information Communication Technology (ICT).

item.title: Watersheds and Forestry
item.description:
Options for Resource Conservation

  • Soil and Water Conservation PPT as PDF Series (USDA)
    • Spring Development English (2.6 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.7 MB)
    • Cisterns English (1.3 MB)and (Dari) دری (1.4 MB)
    • Windbreaks English (3.7 MB) and (Dari) دری (3.8 MB)
    • Bucket Drip Irrigation English (2.5 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.5 MB)
    • Nursery Water Collection and Delivery English (1.5 MB) and (Dari) دری (1.5 MB)
    • Gabion Construction English (2.9 MB)
    • Check Dams English (5.6 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.2 MB)

    • Part 1 English (2.7 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.6 MB)
    • Part 2 English and (Dari) دری (2.9 MB)

    • Assessment English (1.4 MB) and (Dari) دری (1.6 MB)
    • Micro Watershed Zone English (3.3 MB) and (Dari) دری (3.5 MB)
    • Advantages of Vegetation English (3.1 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.9 MB)
    • Planting Dry Areas English (2.9 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.9 MB)
    • Terraces English (1.2 MB) and (Dari) دری (1.3 MB)
    • Riparian Buffers English (2.6 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.6 MB)
    • Riparian Buffers English (2.6 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.6 MB)
    • Soil Bioengineering English (9.7 MB) and (Dari) دری (10 MB)
    • Stone (Riprap) Stream Protection English (2.1 MB) and (Dari) دری (1.4 MB)
    • Seedbeds and Seed Drilling English (4.8 MB) and (Dari) دری (5 MB)
    • Stream Deflectors English (1.3 MB)
    • Water Storage Ponds English (2.7 MB)

    • Framework for Reforestation
      • Manual English (2.6 MB) and (Dari) دری (7.6 MB) (MAIL, USDA, USAID)
      • PPT as PDF (MAIL, USDA, USAID)

    • Planning and Forest Management PPT as PDF English (7.4 MB) (Dari) دری (9.5 MB) (USDA)
    • Community-Based Forest Management Province Example PPT as PDF (USDA Conference)
  • Pistachios as Productive Woodlands
    • Pistachio Woodlands PPT as PDF (4.1 MB) (USDA)
    • Community-Based Pistachio Forest Management PPT as PDF (1.8 MB) (USDA)
  • Measuring Results PPT as PDF (USDA)

Using Trees for Management

  • Establishing Trees
    • What to Know Before Planting Trees in Afghanistan PPT as PDF (2 MB) (UNOPS)
    • Simple Methods for Raising Seedlings English (8.4 MB) (Dari) دری (3.6 MB) (USAID and USDA)
  • Desirable Trees PPT as PDF (SIU)

    • Bareroot Seedling English (2 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.4 MB)
    • Greenhouses and Shadehouses English and (Dari) دری (1.8 MB)
    • Grafting and Budding English and (Dari) دری (1.2 MB)
    • Soil Moisture English (1.2 MB) and (Dari) دری (1.5 MB)
    • Spring Sapling Harvest English (1.6MB) and (Dari) دری (1.5MB)

    • Spring Sapling Sowing and Propagation English (2.2 MB) and (Dari) دری (2.3 MB)
    • Water Collection and Delivery English (1.3 MB)
  • Fodder Tree Options Info Sheet (UC Davis from FAO)
  • Riparian Buffers Info Sheet (GPFA)
  • Soil Testing Kit PPT as PDF English (6.5 MB) and (Dari) دری (6.8 MB) (USDA)
  • Seed Collection PPT as PDF (1.0 MB) (USDA)
  • Tree Borer Fact Sheet (UC Davis)

Using Physical Structures for Management

  • Equipment
    • Build and Use an A-frame Level for Terrace Surveying icon video Video

    • Check Dams Project (SIU and UC Davis)

    • Soil Erosion Info Sheet (NRCS)

    • Hillside Terracing Fact Sheet (GPFA)

Flood Risk Maps

Maps detailing potential flood risks nationally and in select provinces, created by iMMAP

  • National Flood Risk PDF Map April 2013 (1.4 MB), JPEG Map April 2013 (0.6 MB) and PDF Map January 2011 (1.9 MB)

  • Samangan PDF Map July 2012 (1.0 MB)

Province Watershed Studies

A limited number or studies are available; they are uploaded here as they become available.

  • Wardak Province (GPFA)

item.title: Cattle
item.description:
About Cattle in Afghanistan

  • Afghanistan National Livestock Census 2006 Report (11 MB) (FAO)
  • Status Genetic Resources Report (1.4 MB) (FAO)

Pasture and Fodder

  • Animals graze pastures in spring and summer, and are fed in the home compound during the lean feed periods of winter and early spring.
  • Challenges to Grazing Land Info Sheet (UC Davis and SIU)
  • Fodder
    • Crop Options Fact Sheet (UC Davis, SIU and U Georgia)
    • Tree Options Info Sheet (UC Davis from FAO)
    • Alfalfa Role and Establishment Report (1.9 MB) (FAF Developments)
    • Pasture/Forage Resources Profile Report (FAO)

Cattle General

  • Handling Cattle
    • Approaching and Handling Fact Sheet (SIU and UC Davis) Manual (Texas A&M University)
    • Humans and Brucellosis Fact Sheet (UC Davis)
    • Moving Around and Approaching a Herd of Cattle icon video Video (UC Davis)

Dairy

  • Dairy Industry Revitalization Project Case Study (USAID)
  • Production and Processing in Afghanistan Case Study (1.7 MB) (MAIL)
  • Milk Quality Control Manual (ICARDA)
  • Milk Processing Technologies for Small-Scale Producers Manual (1.6 MB) (ICARDA)
  • Pasteurizing Milk Fact Sheet (UC Davis) (1.6 MB) (ICARDA)

Beef

  • Care Practices Manual (UCD)

Diseases

  • Always be cautious around sick animals as some diseases can be spread to humans by touching.
  • Diagnostics: Disease or Poor Nutrition? Fact Sheet (SIU with UC Davis)
  • Disease Prevention (Biosecurity)
    • Limiting Disease Spread Fact Sheet (SIU with UC Davis)
    • From the Illustrated Manual of Infectious Diseases of Livestock In Afghanistan (Fort Valley State University):
      • Cleaning and Disinfecting Fact Sheet English, دری (Dari), and پشتو (Pashto)
      • Carcass Disposal Fact Sheet English, دری (Dari), and پشتو (Pashto)
  • Specific diseases
    • Anthrax Fact Sheet (DCA)
    • Brucellosis and Other Diseases Causing Abortions Fact Sheet (Fort Valley State University)
    • Clostridial Diseases Fact Sheet English, English, دری (Dari), and پشتو (Pashto) (Fort Valley State University)
    • Echinococcosis Fact Sheet English, دری (Dari), and پشتو (Pashto) (Fort Valley State University)
    • Foot and Mouth Disease Fact Sheet (DCA)
    • Johne's Disease Fact Sheet (SIU and UC Davis)
    • Rabies Fact Sheet (DCA)

Production

    • Fact Sheet (IFA)

    • Field Observations for Irrigation Scheduling Fact Sheet (UC Davis)

Production Maps by Province

Total Wheat Production

  • Production by Province Interactive Map (UC Davis)
  • Cultivated Area by Province Interactive Map (UC Davis)
  • Total area Wheat Yield Comparison 2010-2011 PDF Map (1.46 MB) (iMMAP)

Irrigated Wheat Production

  • Production by Province Interactive Map (UC Davis)
  • Cultivated Area by ProvinceInteractive Map (UC Davis)
  • Yield and Production Comparison 2010-2011 PDF Map (1.24 MB) (iMMAP)

Rainfed Wheat Production

  • Production by Province Interactive Map (UC Davis)
  • Cultivated Area by Province Interactive Map (UC Davis)
  • Yield and Production Comparison 2010-2011 PDF Map (1.24 MB) (iMMAP)

Pest Management

Disease

  • UG 99 is a new (potentially devastating) race of the disease stem rust. UG 99-resistant wheat varieties have been developed. Contact CIMMYT or FAO.

Insects

Moroccan Locust

Factsheet

For more information see FAO and Plantwise

Sunn Pest

Brochure

(ICARDA)

Postharvest

  • Dry seed to less than 14% moisture and clean, then use the IRRI Superbag Fact sheet (IRRI) or PIC bag icon videoVideo (Purdue)
